roleset.name: generally terrible, in the absolute lowest ranges

example.name: abysmal-j
example.text: EPS of patients treated between 1975 and 85 was abysmal at 8.5 percent which has increased to 45 percent 2-year-EFS in the recent analysis.
example.arg: EPS of patients treated between 1975 and 85
at 8.5 percent which has increased to 45 percent 2-year-EFS in the recent analysis.

roleset.note: ABYSMAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia. No FN Class.

roleset.name: be extremely unskilled at

example.name: abysmal-j
example.text: She was abysmal at games and hated these turn of phrase ones.

roleset.note: ABYSMAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia. No FN Class.
